source_text: Mother Earth is currently rebalancing herself.
Many imbalances have taken place through the years.
This really gives us the opportunity to go within, to listen to our heart and soul, and to become still in the midst of the chaos and the fear.
It's a time to be loving and compassionate with ourselves and with others globally.
We need to remember that we're all one.
This is an opportunity for humankind to come together and to support each other.
So let's focus on what we have in common.
We are all human ...and set aside the mind and the ego differences.
And the Earth has been letting us know that we need to respect her in a much deeper way than we have.

Let us listen to our hearts and our souls and learn to live in harmony and balance with each other, with ourselves and with Mother Earth It's a challenge to not get lost in the fear, I know that's happening.
And the star beings as well are assisting us during this time.
Ever wonder if there's intelligent life elsewhere in the universe?
Well, I have....I've been wondering since I was a kid.
My name is Reuben Langdon.
And on March 29th 2007, in the middle of the day, I saw a number of strange objects in the sky.
Coincidentally, I was working on the film Avatar at the time, playing an alien.
And ever since then I've been on a quest...
A quest to find out if aliens really do exist and if so... ...are they here with us?
If beings of higher intelligent are here... ...what is their purpose?
Why don't they make themselves more known?
Why the secrecy?
I've asked these questions to many experts, yet each seems to have a different theory.
So I thought to myself, why not ask the aliens directly?
So that's what I set out to do!
Well, sort of...
Robert and Jacqueline, thank you for being here.

You say that you're hybrid human extraterrestrial, and you have actually DNA that's hybridized, and you've also had just an amazing set of encounters and experiences ongoing with different beings, so I'd love to get into that.
And it seems that we're all hybrids to some extent.
Did any of the beings that you've interacted with sort of tell you what the basic human soup genetics-- did they mention which ones are involved?
I don't know all of the races that were involved.
I would think-- a lot of people say there's 12 original races that came down and started messing with our DNA.
It sounds right to me.
I do know that these beings have been modifying human DNA since humans have been human.
They've been doing this for thousands upon thousands of years, you know?
But as far as what species, I'm not too exactly sure which ones.
Do you know which?
Well, I do believe the Anunnaki are key, pretty key in terms of having a hand with altering, or-- I'm not quite sure how to say that.
Genetically manipulating--
With creating some of the genetics.

And I was told that there is a council of beings who kind of were-- they created this experiment, and that they all had a hand in putting in different-- all of their DNA in different ways in terms of seeing how that might go.
So we all could be literally walking hybrids of different species, different things.
Totally.
Totally.
And I think the reason we've been asked to step forward as hybrids is we have-- this is the way I think about it.
We have a much higher frequency of star beingness than most other people.
And we are weird, or different, or fringe, or however you want to say that with our skills.
I've had wild things happen through my life.
During many of my interviews, I've talked to people who are sort of telepathic or have abilities.

And a lot of them say around the age six, I was visited by a thing, or I saw a saucer, and it seems to be an ongoing theme that they probably already had it in them, but this experience sort of woke them up. >> Activated.
Activated it.
Do you guys recall around that age having--
I got my implants when I was five.
Five, OK.
This goes to the ignorance thing of a five-year-old.
I remember when I was-- what is five?
Like first grade?
Kindergarten?
Around there?
Kindergarten.
Yeah. >> Kindergarten?
I remember going to the school library, and the librarian would be reading books and they would talk-- it was a book about a kid that had cancer, right?
And the kid was talking about how he was feeling these lumps in his mouth.
And it wasn't like just, I would say a week after I heard that book, I was feeling two lumps under my tongue.
And I remember going to my mom, mom, mom, there's lumps-- there's lumps under my tongue.
There's lumps under my tongue.
I got cancer.
I got cancer.
She's like, oh, no, son, there's lumps under everybody's tongue.
So I just kind of like-- I always played with them.
They stressed out, like, I know it's cancer.
I know it's cancer.
But--
I'm feeling around my mouth right now.
I'm like, oh, I think I feel some lumps too.
Yeah, right?
But you know, I actually-- I can grab them and pull on them.
Even my dentist doesn't quite really know what they are.
Oh, wow.
One's about the size of a little-- like, shaped like a teardrop.
It's a grain of rice, but like a size of a grain of rice.
And then the other one's like a little tiny ball.
Interesting.
And they flip.
You can flip them around and everything.
You can flip the-- no, that would be freaky.
OK.
But yeah, so it started at five.
Five is when I got those implants put in.
Interesting.
So that's the implant-- those are implants.
Yeah.
Interesting.
And at that age, were they-- were you sort of aware and told that you were getting implants?
Or you were just--
Oh I'm totally unaware.
Or that came later.
Totally unaware, yeah.
It came later.
All right.
And these are from the Mantis beings?
I believe so, yeah.
OK, well, speaking of Mantis beings, I've had sort of a personal experience recently with them.

And it's interesting because I haven't-- during all these interviews I do with different ET collectives and individuals, you know, you hear about the Zeta Reticuli, the Pleiades, the Arcturus and even Reptilians.
But the Mantis hadn't really been in my radar.
And then I had this experience with this Mantis energy.
That's all I can say, you know.
I identified it as the Mantis because I had seen-- in this world, you read and it pops up every now and then.
But it hasn't been really explored and discussed.
So I'd really like to sort of get your viewpoints on what are the Mantis beings.
What do they-- why are they interacting with humans in this way?
And sort of just your personal take on that energy.
I've noticed that too when I was starting to do my research on the subject, trying to figure out what was going on with me.
I noticed that there is not a lot of information out there about the Mantis beings at all.
You know, there is that the Mantis beings created the Gray race, you know.
But--
I didn't hear that.
But that resonates now with the download that I got.
So thank you for sharing.
So what I understand from the Mantis beings is that, there's many praying mantis insects running around, different species, different looks, different-- and it's the same out there.
But from what I understand is that they were here at the very beginning.
You know, they were, like, one of the first aspects of creation in the universe, of physical creation.

If you think everything is kind of like a fractal, right, of the whole, you know, here on Earth, if you think of Earth as far as humanity knows how evolution went, you first have your bacterial life and then more complex forms.
And then finally, you get into the insects, and then the amphibians and the reptiles, right?
Because the conditions are harsh.
So you need that exoskeleton first.
So I believe-- and that's where you're more negative Mantis being comes from.
It's just-- the universe is just created.
And it's chaos.
It's--
Survival of the fittest.
--radioactive.
It's survival of the fittest, you know, so I believe that's where your negative Mantis comes from.
Then they evolve to the next stage, where now, they're not so negative, you know?
And then evolve to the next stage, to the next stage, and to the next stage.

But since there they've been evolving for countless billions of years, they exist on every single level simultaneously because as we know it, time is more circular than it is linear, as we experience it.
So they exist just on every level simultaneously.
The ones that we interact with, they've evolved beyond their exoskeleton.
So they don't have the harder shell anymore.
And they're extremely benevolent and extremely loving.
The reason why they're here interacting with Earth, these are creator beings.
If you imagine, they're so evolved that just one of their consciousness has the ability to be aware of everyone's conscious-- every living things' conscious on the planet.
It can literally encompass an entire galaxy, whereas we can only experience and comprehend these walls around us.
Because I can only see and perceive what's around me.
They have the ability to perceive galaxies, you know.
So they're just here.
I think they're just here mostly to observe but just to help.
And alls they want to do is help humanity evolve.
And they also want to help create new divine expressions of creation.
So that's pretty much why they're here.
Interesting.
Jacquelin, you want to piggyback off of that?
Yeah, I've had a lot of interaction with the Mantis beings.
And when they come and talk to me-- and also, I do star origin readings for people.
So a lot of the times-- well, a number of times, those people will be Mantis.
So I get to have the interaction with different types of Mantis beings.
And then I'm clairvoyant so they show me where they're from.
And actually, I go there from that frequency, I'll call it.

And what they have shared with me is-- I agree in that they are very, very highly-- one of the most-- I believe, one of the most highly evolved cultures, and that they did certainly have a hand in creating, and creation, in creating the universe as we know it.
And some other races do as well.
But the Mantis, they are very highly evolved beings, incredible healers.
And they're very playful.
They love to laugh and have fun.
So they show up at my house all the time.
And I-- they like to dance.
It sounds silly, but they like to do movements.
And one morning I was actually laying in bed.
And eight of them showed up in my bedroom.
This was very calming for me.
Yeah.
And I go, good morning.
And they said, we would love for you to get up and move with us, or some people might say dance.
And that sounds kind of silly.
But they have--
A little more than exercise.
Any being that has evolved understands play, the concept of play and joy and laughter.
And I said, oh, I don't want to, but I will.
[LAUGHS] Talk about getting dragged out of bed in the morning.
I was.
I was dragged out.
Could they at least make you coffee?
I was complaining.
And so I got out of bed, OK.
And I started moving.
And my whole neck snapped.
My whole spinal column aligned, and my whole neck snapped.
And they had aligned my whole spinal column and neck just like that.
Wow.
And so I thanked them for that.
So like a cosmic chiropractic appointment.
Absolutely.
And so they interact.
And they come to me, and I draw a lot of the symbols they give me to share with others.
And actually, yes-- so I have interactions with them often.
And even though they're very high creators, and where they come from, where I have visited, they just of course all telepathically communicate, because they're energy.
And they have showed a little about their culture with me.
And there's a temple that I've been to at least six times.
That's just-- it's like a crystalline temple that's a spiral.
And they've taken me through, showing this to me.
And I've been through the spiral.

And earlier on, what the Mantis beings did was invite other cultures, other races to come that they felt were ready to come and engage with being a part of a-- it's not really a ritual but with experiencing this crystalline temple where they would go through the spiral.
And it would actually help their DNA to evolve.
So the actual physical structure of the temple was like a spiral form.
Yes.
It's-- and it's not density like here.
It's more of an etheric, crystalline frequency.
It's just incredibly beautiful.
So I have a very high respect.
But yet, they're very playful and can be very silly and give you information that's just amazing.
On this New Year's Eve-- I was sharing with Rob that eight of them showed up at my house.
There was a white Mantis being, so there's different species.
Some show up to me as being a neon purple, blue green.
There's brown.
There's all these different species.
So they all showed up.
And they were around me most of the day.
And I understood they were preparing me to write down this DNA code from them, which I did.
And after I wrote it down, I shook-- my body shook for half an hour because it was such high frequency.
And I thanked them because I was so moved that I could have the opportunity to allow that, to just sit and come through.
And actually, it was on the screen when I had given my talk.
Oh, OK.
And actually-- yeah.
So-- but they're very loving, kind, compassionate fun, fun, fun beings.
Would you have any idea of what dimension or density that the majority of these beings reside in?
Well, you're asking about the Mantis.
Yes, the Mantis being.
From my perspective-- and again, there's different species that are in different frequencies.
Yeah.
Those who I interact with, I would classify them more with the angelic realm definitely.
And when they appear to people sometimes, they will appear with the wings to not scare people.
And they're not truly wings.
It's their energy around them.
But that's how highly evolved they are.
So it's almost beyond physical form in a collective.
Absolutely.
Yes.
The best way to describe it, it's like a drop of water in an ocean of consciousness is what it is really.
And there is a singular consciousness amongst them.
But they do have a-- it's not a hive mind.
It's a collective.
A collective.
It's like an ocean of consciousness.
Yeah, we've explored-- in past episodes we've explored Peleiadian collectives, different densities and dimensions of the collectives.
And it sort of seems that from seventh and beyond, individuals sort of lose their-- they don't lose it.
They still have their individual experiences and ideas.
But then they start operating from a collective consciousness.
Well, and there's no ego involved.
Humanity, we have the ego, and we need the ego here.
But they don't.
It's a whole 'nother experience--
Yeah, it is a weight--
--without the ego, they understand, they know the oneness.
We do too.
You know, everyone really does.
It's remembering.
But it's just there all the time.
It's a oneness, the love, the harmony, the peace.
Yeah.
It's a curious-- you know, it's infinite curiosity is what it is.
Because--
Curiosity on their behalf or--
They-- they're just curious.
And it gets into how the universe was created and why we're all curious.
We're all curious.
It's interesting.
The download I got-- and you mentioned angels.
So I sort of made the correlation.
So this-- the visitation I had was on the lunar eclipse.
What perfect timing.
Yeah, when was it, the end of September last year?
Yes.
Oh.
And it went on for a couple hours.
And I was shaking and got a full on experience.
And I've never had-- I've been doing this kind of work and interviews and everything and ET realms for a long time, but I've never had a personal experience.
That's wonderful.
And I was sort of getting this download of the creation not of the universe but of the human experience.
And then I related-- so the Zetas came up, the Grays, and also, a lot of Reptilian stuff came up.

And I sort of saw-- they were presenting to me telepathically images of-- and what I was I guess translating in my own-- with these images, having to translate, and feelings, and all sorts of stuff was happening.
But I saw how Reptilians saw them as Angels.
Does that resonate?
Yeah, if you think about it, you know, you hear a lot of abduction experiences where the Mantis beings always playing an observer role.
They work with every-- all the beings, all of them.
They don't like to-- they don't interfere with the other races so much, you know?
They're just they're mostly to observe, to understand every aspect of creation.
And so a lot of the time, they're just there as observers.
Yeah, that's-- I got that there was a distress call from the Reptilians in a way that they wanted to evolve, I guess, out of their Reptilian archetypal structure.
And in order to do so, they called upon the Mantis, just like we would pray to an Angel in that sense.
And then the Mantis beings came in.
And I guess that's how the human experience was formed, to help the evolution of this Reptilian consciousness.
They also have-- I do know they also have-- they have symbiotic relationships with a lot of beings too because for an example, there's is a race of beings.
They would look like a Gray.
They look just like a Gray, except for the ones that I've seen there, they have a small head.
They're really short, like, three feet tall, wear a black jumpsuit type thing.
They have these lines on their faces that are just like wrinkles.
And they were created so that way, the Mantis beings can interact with lower dimensions sometimes.
A lot of times, when the Mantis work with me, these little Gray guys, who act as a barrier of-- because I've had an experience where I was eating.
My wife made some jalapeno-- bacon wrapped jalapeno poppers.
She put the toothpick into it.
And I was just gobbling them down.
And I accidentally swallowed a toothpick.
Oh, no.
And so-- I was like, OK, well, it doesn't hurt me now.
I had a little upset stomach, but I'm going to have to deal with this tomorrow.
It's like 12 o'clock at night.
I mean, I'm really bad about going to the doctor when I'm supposed to.
But next thing I know, I feel-- my body starts stretching out.
And I'll see these little beings walk in and the Mantis being behind them.
The Mantis being says, you know, this is going to feel weird.
And the little guy puts his hand in my stomach, and it goes into my stomach.
If you've ever a hand go into your stomach, it's the weirdest feeling ever.
So I snapped out of it, out of my paralysis.
And I grabbed the being by the head.
And I had my thumb in it's mouth, you know?
And it's chewing on my thumb.
I could feel it's little gums, and it's saliva, and it's soft skin.
And the Mantis being just waves it's hand over me.
And the next thing I know, I'm having a dream where I'm chasing butterflies.
Oh.
So the Mantis being, they've evolved to the point where their minds can manipulate matter.
So let's take this pillow--
Levitate.
Let's take this pillow for an example, right?
They have the ability to make the electrons and atoms in this pillow move to match their frequency.
And so they can just move through it.
So it's all-- they're just masters of the universe.
So they don't even really need technology.
Right.
And the work that they do with the Reptilians is-- like, they need this, and helping them evolve and just to observe everything.
So did you get the toothpick out?
Yes.
It was out.
It did get out.
That was fine.
But what a weird feeling, having a hand digging in your stomach.
Oh, weird.
Well, for years, people have been trying to get Robert and I together--
OK.
--you know, over the phone and that.
And we both had so much going on at the same time, we just did not connect.
A couple years ago, I came to this conference.
And Robert was here as well.
He was staying in a separate place.
And I was actually getting ready to leave the conference.
So all these people were around us, saying, you two gotta get together now.
Now's the time.
Now's the time, which was awesome.
And we came together.
And we were looking at each other.
And we couldn't even speak.
Our mouths just fell open.
And we were just like, holy cow and knew we are on ships together, have been, are on ships together, and that we have this really close Mantis connection.
And we just really clicked.
We spontaneously, when we were together-- and there were a few other hybrids around-- we spontaneously did the Mantis bow together.
And--
The Mantis bow?
We had never-- there was no way either of us could have known that.
You know what I'm saying?
We had never-- we just spontaneously did it.
And then we went into speaking the way we do as Mantis.
And then we just had so much fun.
Everybody was having fun there, watching and enjoying it.
And so he and I, Robert and I have been very connected since.
We talk a lot over the phone and have discussions that most people would not understand, that's Mantis.
So we get to share these wonderful happenings and frequencies.
And that is very special for us.
The best way I put it-- it's like a similar feeling that people can relate to, it's the same thing as two Americans living in Russia, for example.
And we don't speak Russian very well.
And now, of these two Americans, we meet.
And oh, not only are we two Americans, but we're from the same state or from the same town.
So we have this really, really unique connection that Russians wouldn't be able to understand.
This is the exact same feeling, you know.
So you had this greeting.
Was sort of an unconscious bow--
It just happened spontaneously.
--greeting that just happened.
And when you say language, is it actually another separate language language?
It's not English?
No.
Wow.
And is it-- and you understand the words?
Or is it more intuitive?
It's more of a frequency.
If you think about it, they don't really talk in a language.
It's more of a frequency.
So it's like a psychic vibrational connection that you just-- it's hard to understand--
So you're not actually moving your lips then.
Yeah.
Oh, you are.
Oh, it's out loud, yeah.
Everybody thought we-- it was fun.
It's a physical manifestation of communication.
Of the energy.
Because you can't bring it through in English.
It's a frequency.
And the voice shifts in all kinds of ways to-- it just comes through.
It's so pure.
And--
It's not a learned thing.
It's just-- - It's a natural thing.
It's a natural soul kind of language.
Interesting.
I've had a being say once-- another hybrid, they're just full on realized, you know?
And they're able to bring their full ET self in.
Right.
They say, everybody uses the harsh words, you know.
It's hard on our ears.
It hurts our ears.
Why can't they speak like you speak?
Why can't they talk like you talk?
When you do the language, it's like it's just a frequency.
It's a--
Harsh words meaning English being harsh words?
Because the vibration of our language is a third dimensional language, so if you imagine, it would be like someone who listens to Mozart now having death metal played in their ear.
[LAUGHTER]
Yeah, I can see that.
That's the difference, you know.
That's very-- the energy here is very harsh.
Yeah.
OK, yeah, OK.
So speaking of the mission then, let's get into that.
What is the mission?
Why this contact?
Why the hybridization?
Why-- what's going on?
It's really a multi-dimensional thing, right?
So there's many, many layers and different aspects to why.
One of the reasons why, for me anyways, they had to do a little bit of the tweaking so that way, my consciousness could incarnate into this body, right?
Now, that doesn't make me-- in all reality, it doesn't make me much different from me and you because when it happens, I have the same thing.
I forget.
I don't have any memory of this.
So what happens if, like, you want to understand what it is to be-- let's see-- an ant, for an example, right?
Well, you would come and live the life of an ant, right?
You can't just like-- you can sit there and study them all you want.
But actually get to understand it is to incarnate as one.
Sure.
And it could have the exact same-- not as superpower ant.
Sure, some things do bleed through, like some psychic things and whatnot.
But as far as me, it's-- I didn't have the psychicness or any of that.
Well, I'm sure it was there.
I just didn't realize it.
But-- [LAUGHTER] But you know, to live a human experience, to go through the childhood, you know, and the harshness of this reality.

So that way, I can better understand what it is to be a human being, just so I can understand humanity so when they do come to introduce themselves to humanity, they can now figure out how can I do this without completely destroying this civilization.
So now, if you go back to the ant analogy here, imagine now you, as a person, looking at an ant colony, right?
And let's say someone came by and kicked the ant hill, right?
And now, we're coming down, looking at it.
I mean, as a person, how do I make these ants not go crazy?
You can't just take your finger, and you put your finger in the ant hill--
They'll bite it.
They're going to go crazy, you know?
So you just have to sit back and observe.
And the only way we can-- the only way they can help the ants now is to go in as an ant and tell the ants, hey, guys, don't worry about the big dude up there.
Don't worry about it.
There's no need to panic.
Just rebuild--
They're only here to help.
Or the big dude up there just wasn't paying attention and kicked over the hill.
Exactly.
Right.
So we just gotta rebuild the hill.
Exactly.
And so a lot of us come down to help so it's not so frightening.
And I know it's frightening because I've been through the fear.
And that was part of my mission, if you will, to go through being ignorant, being-- I mean, I was go, George Bush, you know, at the time, and bomb Saddam.
And I was, like, ignorant, just a typical American.
You know, America, woo!
You know?
Nice.
And then all of a sudden, it's like I said, a ET comes around.
And I just-- it scared the daylights out of me.
And they didn't want-- they didn't like--
So you really did.
Most of us sort of have this-- slow, for me, I discovered spirituality and martial arts, and you know, kind of been digesting this stuff.
So you went from George Bush to Mantis being.
Oh, my god, yeah, a Mantis being.
Wow.
And it-- I mean, I believe that most of the human population is completely unaware of and ignorant to the reality of--
Reality.
Of reality, exactly.
What we know reality is.
What reality is.
Yes.
So I ended up becoming a fractal of what I believe what's to come.
And that's contact with the beings.
And so what's going to happen at first, when most of the population just has the truth smack him in the face-- you know, the same thing happened to me.
The truth smacked me in the face.
So now that I have that experience, I'm able to tell people, it's OK, it's OK.
You know, I've worked the steps.
I've gone through the trials and tribulations.
In a short amount of time it sounds like.
An extremely short amount of time.
Huh.
Congratulations.
Thank you.
You're here.
You're alive.
I'm alive.
And you know, it's been a nightmare.
I mean, if you want to get into how it started.
But you know, if you want to do your mission first.
Well, I've been an animal communicator for 36 years professionally.
And I've always been telepathic and psychic.
Earlier on, I had dreams that came true, and knew when someone was going to cross over, which was not fun to know sometimes.
In the-- with the animals?
Or with people.
With humans because I worked with both people and the animals psychically.
And so it's been a rough road.
And my abilities developed earlier on because I had a near-death experience at six years old.
So I went into all those realms and knew it and came back with that.
But in terms of that, it unfolded for me in that-- I've been through some very tough stuff in my life, as most of us have, and had another near-death experience in my 20s.
And that really set me on my path with all of this.
And so it really kicked me in super high gear into using telepathy.
I was-- other things were going on psychically as well.
So I chose to use those energies to communicate with animals and to be of service, to give the animals a voice so people could understand the animals.
And then I was working psychically with people as well, doing psychic readings for people.
And then when I fully realized I had the ET frequencies and all of that, then I started opening and really unfolding.
Things started unfolding for me to get into that.
And so I see my mission as giving the message that we are all one and helping people to get in touch with who they are.
Because the star readings I do helps their star families show up.
And I just get them connected and give messages and give them tone mantras to do that really connect.
So I love doing that.
It's great fun.

And also, I'm a certified hypnotherapist and work with experiencers to help them process their experiences because I've been through it all, I mean, really with positive experience with beings, not so positive experiences with beings.
And I certainly understand the human experience pretty much from A to Z, I can say.
It's a pretty wide spectrum.
It's been an interesting life.
And I'm glad I'm at where I am at and so grateful to be here and have many miracles.
I mean, I have had two NDEs.
And another time, I almost died about 11 years ago.
So it's been quite a walk.
Is that from an actual physical event and then--
Yeah, just some-- yeah.
OK.
So I've had a lot of miracles in order to stay here and continue sharing.
I love sharing with people and talking about all of this and about star beings and sharing about the different kinds of cultures of star beings and their languages and symbols.
And so I'm doing a lot of that now, light language and symbols with people.
And that's-- I can't think of anything to do that would be more fun.
Wow.
Well, getting back to your guys' interactions.
Do you have actual memories of being on the ships that you might be able to share and what those experiences-- and what entailed-- what's going on, or what happened.
Oh my.
If you want to.
I do, but I'm trying to think of which one would be-- I'll give you two, two experiences that I would say are my most profound experiences ever.
And I drew pictures of it.
To recreate my experience, I'll let you check them out.
Oh, please.
